::Perndabot::

Perndabot walks off down the corridor, motioning for Antagony to 
follow. "I'll take you to him. I have to get back to patrolling soon."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jen D." <jeniff@h...> wrote:
> Antagony smiled at Vlad when he complimented her name. He seemed a 
bit out 
> of place in this base. Antagony glanced back at Perndabot to compare 
Vlad to 
> him, and decided that they were pretty different robots. She then 
looked 
> back at Vlad and smiled.
> 
> "Why thank you. I hope we'll be friends, but I still have to 
officially join 
> this team." She looked back at Perndabot. "Do I have to speak to 
your 
> commander about joining or can I just join up?"
